metadata.title: CVE-2019-8331 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
In Bootstrap before 3.4.1 and 4.3.x before 4.3.1, XSS is possible in the tooltip or popover data-template attribute.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-8331` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

fonts-glyphicons-halflings - 3.4.1+dfsg-1
libjs-bootstrap - 3.4.1+dfsg-1
No subscription required

libjs-bootstrap4 - 4.3.1+dfsg2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: twitter-bootstrap3 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.1+dfsg-1').
twitter-bootstrap4 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.1+dfsg2-1').
